name: SugarCacti (Beta)
description:
Version 1.8: Revamping the currency system prior to this update. Currency will not appear until 1.8.1.

A simple game to enjoy. Like Cookie Clicker but without the clicking part.

Press space to chop down the SugarCactus, press C to convert one cactus and X to convert all to sugar. Sugar is the currency and you can use them to buy boosters.

This project was started on October 25, 2018. I had worked on it for about a year, making 7 updates before scrapping the game. I have decided to release it and do just a few more updates, as the game was not finished yet.

Final update will most likely be update 1.10.x
